title: Export Zip: Busy cursor is not shown when updating checkboxes (1GKWVMA)
description: When updating the checked state of the table during the export Zip process, it takes a long time (about 30 seconds in my case) for the changes to be reflected. The expected behavior is that a busy cursor should be shown during this time.
OB: During the update of the checked state of the table, no busy cursor is displayed.
EB: A busy cursor should be shown during the update of the checked state of the table.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Perform an export Zip.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose some file types.
5. Press OK.
